Author: thetachibabe
Text: Yes, he said that too which is why I said I’d be open to maybe eat more. My recent weight gain has just been super hard and I think I’ll be more open to being a bit healthier when it starts going down again. I’m just terrified of gaining weight right now.  Thank you so much for being concerned though. I love the support from this group it genuinely means a lot.

Author: fawnfreckles
Text: im happy you have such a supportive bf! but maybe try and go a bit over 500 for those weeks, at least once or twice every  week? i know its kinda dumb to say that here with how this can affect us but please try and keep yourself healthy, especially if you'll be going to the gym alongside restricting. im happy youre going to do your best over the holidays as well! have a good time, please enjoy yourself to the fullest!
